entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rocky Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
